archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.6f: f) only used for a new purpose if this is compatible with the original purpose, data subject consent is obtained, or there is a clear obligation or function set out in law
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
